title: Both my refund tokens were used randomly.
body: I got onto LoL and noticed that I randomly had 2000 rp in my account when I had 200 before. I played a game of zed and since I have championship zed I decided to use it. But it said I didn't have it even bought. After the game, I restarted the client thinking it was a bug and I checked my refund page and it said I "refunded" two skins, championship zed and TPA ezreal. I never clicked onto the store. Has this happened to anyone before? If it has what did you do, I already submitted a ticket. Also, I'm not lying because I want my skins back.

replies.body:
Submitting a ticket was the best move here. It sounds like your account may have been accessed by someone else. As a precaution, I'd recommend changing the password for both your League account and your email address tied to this account.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Ok, I submitted a ticket. I was wondering If you knew if there was a possibility of me getting my refund tokens back and my championship skin. I don't really care about the ezreal skin but since the zed skin isn't available anymore I would really want it back.

It's possible, but the specialist that is assigned your ticket will need to investigate and make that call with you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
